mapper.insert: insert into stockoprationbill (productInfo_id, stockIncome_id, inputTime, specific_id, productionPrice, costPrice, number, memberPrice, productionDate, survivalTime, warnNumber,productStock_id,warnDate,operation,sn,openStockNumber,openStockPrice,openStock_id) values (#{productInfo.id}, #{stockIncome.id}, #{inputTime}, #{specific.id}, #{productionPrice}, #{costPrice}, #{number}, #{memberPrice}, #{productionDate}, #{survivalTime}, #{warnNumber}, #{productStock.id},#{warnDate}, #{operation},#{sn},#{openStockNumber},#{openStockPrice},#{openStock.id})
mapper.update: update stockoprationbill set productStock_id = #{productStock}, warnDate = #{warnDate}, operation = #{operation}, productInfo_id = #{productInfo.id}, stockIncome_id = #{stockIncome.id}, inputTime = #{inputTime}, specific_id = #{specific.id}, productionPrice = #{productionPrice}, costPrice = #{costPrice}, number = #{number}, memberPrice = #{memberPrice}, productionDate = #{productionDate}, survivalTime = #{survivalTime}, warnNumber = #{warnNumbe}, supplier_id = #{supplier.id} , sn = #{sn}, openStockNumber = #{openStockNumber} ,openStockPrice = #{openStockPrice}, openStock_id = #{openStock.id} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, productInfo_id, stockIncome_id, inputTime, specific_id, productionPrice, costPrice, number, memberPrice, productionDate, survivalTime, warnNumber,supplier_id, productStock_id,warnDate,operation,sn,openStockNumber,openStockPrice,openStock_id from stockoprationbill where id = #{id}

select id, productInfo_id, stockIncome_id, inputTime, specific_id, productionPrice, costPrice, number, memberPrice, productionDate, survivalTime, warnNumber, supplier_id,productStock_id,warnDate,operation,sn,openStockNumber,openStockPrice,openStock_id from stockoprationbill

select id, productInfo_id, stockIncome_id, inputTime, specific_id, productionPrice, costPrice, number, memberPrice, productionDate, survivalTime, warnNumber,supplier_id,productStock_id,warnDate,operation,sn,openStockNumber,openStockPrice,openStock_id from stockoprationbill
select id from productinfo WHERE name=#{name}
select id from specifics WHERE beforeSpecific=#{name}
select id from openstock WHERE name=#{name}
select id from stockincome WHERE name=#{name}
